title: Color Contrast Checker
creator: Monsido
description: The tool tests the contrast of your background and text for accessibility. You can use it to visualise different color combination palettes for your website design that are in compliance with WCAG, EU directive, and ADA standards.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
